message: You don't have to exactly make drugs legal. Other countries have gotten it right by decriminalizing every drug. So that means people can get away with having so much of whatever drug. Crime rate has gone down and less younger people using drugs. It would equal less ODs as well because """"friends"""" have been known to ditch a body because they OD from fear of dialing 911. Or dialing 911 and then leaving an the ambulance not making it. Addicts wouldn't be as afraid and less people would die. That's a fact.
